content.question: The plan and the aerial view show the Great Mosque of Djenné in present-day Mali.Identify specific features in the building that are distinctive to mosque architecture. Analyze how mosque architecture relates to the practices of Islam.

frqParts.text: The plan and the aerial view show the Great Mosque of Djenné in present-day Mali.Identify specific features in the building that are distinctive to mosque architecture. Analyze how mosque architecture relates to the practices of Islam.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
